subdomain.title: Label for the subdomain field when the user is installing the App.

key.value: The unique key used to make a request to teachmyapi.com.
key.title: Label for the teachmyapi key field when the user is installing the App.

new_data.value: The new data to be sent to herokuapp.com.
new_data.title: Label for the new data field when the user is installing the App.

btn_get_api.title: The button to get the teachmyapi API details

btn_post_api.title: The button to post to the herokuapp API

btn_go_back.title: Message displayed on the button that navigates back to the start page.
